vlive.korean: [귀여운데 멋있어 멋있는데 귀여워 하도 말했더니 이제 말도 안 나온다네요...] [He's cute and awesome, yet, awesome and cute...] View video V PICK! : [ONF] 오내노뿌와 함께라면 야 너두 한국어 마스터 할 수 있어🤓 (J-US&U’s Korean class)
vlive.english: [He's cute and awesome, yet, awesome and cute...]

vlive.korean: 하도 뭐라 해서 - 아니야! SUGA constantly asked me to come. - No way! 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13 with J-HOPE #0613FM_0523
vlive.english: SUGA constantly asked me to come. - No way!

vlive.korean: 연준이 형이 탈색을 하도 많이 했으니까 - 진짜? He bleached many times. - Really? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 헐 모아 여러분🤭
그래서 - 콘텐츠 좀 줄여도 되겠네 하도... So... - I should do this less frequently. 듣기 View video WINNER : How to 멋 2
vlive.english: So... - I should do this less frequently.

vlive.korean: [하도 많이 죽어서 화도 안 남] 뭐야? 나 왜 죽었어? [He's not even angry any more] What? Why am I dead? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - 서바이벌 Director's cut
vlive.english: [He's not even angry any more] What? Why am I dead?

examples.korean: I’ve dialled the number so many times I know it by heart. 발음듣기 내가 그 번호를 하도 많이 돌려서[그 번호로 전화를 하도 많이 하여] 그걸 외운다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve dialled the number so many times I know it by heart. 발음

examples.korean: I’ve made this trip so often, I could do it with my eyes shut. 발음듣기 난 이 길을 하도 자주 다녀서 두 눈 감고도 갈 수 있을 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve made this trip so often, I could do it with my eyes shut. 발음

examples.korean: Inflation was so high that the notes were like Monopoly money. 발음듣기 인플레이션이 하도 심해서 지폐가 한낱 종잇조각 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Inflation was so high that the notes were like Monopoly money. 발음

examples.korean: He shouted so loudly that the whole neighbourhood could hear him. 발음듣기 그가 하도 크게 고함을 질러서 온 이웃사람들이 다 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He shouted so loudly that the whole neighbourhood could hear him. 발음

examples.korean: I worked there so long that I became part of the furniture. 발음듣기 나는 거기에서 하도 오래 일을 해서 이제 그곳 비품의 일부처럼 되어 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I worked there so long that I became part of the furniture. 발음
